Articles.Content: I am getting a little tired of the nozzle effects,The whole blue ball thing an all. I was wondering if there is a mod that makes better engine nozzle effects?, because I can't find one. Maybe something like the shock heating effects but more concentrated.If there is can I get a link to the download. If not could somebody make one and upload it because I would appreciate that so much!
dunno if there is one but if the effects were ultra-realistic, it would be amazing. Fear not, I do believe that will be worked on before the game is complete.
There are particle/lighting/smoke/cloudlet updates on the Planned Features list, so if there are shader based engine exhausts coming down the line they'll probably be in there somewhere
